Perceptor/Blackstorm:

"Blackstorm!"said cooly perceptor "Prepare all instruments... We 
will do a massive reconstruction, I see you in area 6 in Cr's"

"Yes, Perceptor"said the femme and she moved acros the Cr's chamber 
and picked up diferents tools.

Perceptor took in arms at Maxima and lef her on a table in Area 6. 
he typed some buttoms of a console that was near him and a powerful 
scanner started to check Maxima's condition and main problems.

"Whoever did this, Maxima"said Perceptor "really liked to kill you"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/20/03 11:21:41 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > WHAT HAPPENS HERE?" arrieved roaring Perceptor, Blackstorm 
looked 
> > him and said "Perceptor, she..."
> 
> She growled as Perceptor yelled. Her cranium was aching. Amazingly 
enough. 
> She couldn't believe the weakness she was experiencing. 
> 
> > 
> > "Ohhh, let me see" interrupted Perceptor rudely and started to 
check 
> > Maxima "What happen Maximal??? "
> > 
> 
> "This weak form. I have a task for you.. Perceptor. If you cannot 
handle it, 
> then find Wheeljack-X. He was supposed to have started work on my 
old style 
> form before I came here. This body is inadiqate. Until that new 
form if 
> constructed... I need a better form." her words so confident.
> 
> 
> OOC:

similar to

form. 
> Then eventually, either sooner or later, she may go back to her 
old style
